name: KidPunk
description:
In a post apocalyptic world, our badass and invincible main character has to keep a mysterious and oblivious robot alive (see what we did there?) during their adventures. She has access to two tools: a shotgun to get rid of the bandits attacking the robot and an umbrella acting as both a platform and a protection against acid dropped by drones throughout the 4 levels of the game.

The programming parts were done by our engineers: @Achiru, @Kazz96, @Minipeps and @Wakobu.

The art was done by @yoyocaster (characters, cutscenes), @Squeele (Backgrounds, music) and @Kazz(Sound design, music).

We fixed some minor bugs in a recent update
